sentences.en: The hologram can be flipped to show the inverse image.

sentences.en: Then a hologram of Captain McNeil rose in front of him.
sentences.cn: 之后船长麦克尼尔的一幅全息影像出现在他的面前。

sentences.en: Parker lies in darkness, recalling the tousand fragments of the hologram rose.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中Parker躺在那里，回想起刚才那朵全息玫瑰的万千碎片。
